import React, { useContext } from 'react' import './cartitems.css' import { ShopContext } from '../Context/ShopContext' import remove_icon from '../Assests/cart_cross_icon.png' export const CartItems = () => { function handleProceedToCheckout() { window.location.href = '/add'; } const {getTotalCartAmount,all_product,cartItems,removeFromCart}=useContext(ShopContext); return (

Products

Title

Price

Quantity

Total

Remove

{all_product.map((e)=>{ if(cartItems[e.id]>0) { return

{e.name}

${e.new_price}

Rs.{e.new_price*cartItems[e.id]}

{removeFromCart(e.id)}} alt=""/>
} return null; })}

Cart Totals

SubTotal

Rs.{getTotalCartAmount()}

Shipping Fee

Free

Total

Rs.{getTotalCartAmount()}

) }
